title: Sage

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may inspect a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night you are alive, you will be told how many Florae are still alive.
- The player you inspect will not be included in your count.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value: "Excluding your target, there are currently (#) Florae alive."
